import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react'; const GameAddForm = (props) => { const [game,setGame] = useState({ title: '', genre: '', played: false, }) const handleReset = () => { setGame({title: '', genre: '',played:false}); } return (
Add Game
{setGame({...game, title: e.target.value})}} type="text" className="form-control" id="inputPassword" value={title} />
{setGame({...game, genre: e.target.value})}} type="text" className="form-control" id="inputPassword" value={genre} />
{setGame({...game, played: e.target.checked})}} type="checkbox" value={played} id="flexCheckChecked" />
); }; export default GameAddForm;
